content:
1. Resident feedback shows an increase in positive attitudes towards working together as a team.
2. Residents participate in team-building activities at least once per month.
3. Residents demonstrate increased collaboration and cooperation during community events.
4. Residents express a sense of belonging and connection to their living community.
5. Residents show an understanding of each other's strengths and utilize them to accomplish team goals.
6. Residents demonstrate an ability to resolve conflicts effectively within the living community.
7. Resident satisfaction with the level of communication and feedback received from their peers and staff.
8. Residents actively engage in providing constructive feedback and suggestions for community improvement.
9. Residents consistently show respect towards one another and their shared living spaces.
10. Residents demonstrate an increased willingness to help each other out and lend a helping hand.
11. Residents express an appreciation for diversity and actively seek out opportunities to learn from each other.
12. Residents are able to identify and work towards common goals as a team.
13. Residents demonstrate an increased sense of responsibility and ownership over their living community.
14. Residents show an understanding of the importance of teamwork in achieving community goals.
15. Residents actively engage in planning and executing community events together.
